channel.title: parliaments on Tom Louwerse
channel.description: Recent content in parliaments on Tom Louwerse

item.title: Who opposes?
item.description: The main objectives of this project are to measure and explain government-opposition cooperation and to study its consequences for democratic legitimacy and vote choice.

item.title: The Nature of Political Representation in Times of Dealignment
item.description: This project investigates the viability, and conditions of, dyadic forms of representation in established European democracies

item.title: Political Representation: Linking Citizens and Representatives
item.description: Are representatives doing what people want?

item.title: Parliaments: rules and behaviour
item.description: How do MPs and parties behave in parliament?
